summary: Successfully implemented streaming results with Suspense and enhanced UX improvements. Fixed authentication issues, integrated streaming for search results with incremental loading, created streaming table and enrichment components, added framer-motion animations, and built comprehensive loading states. Added new AI Search module with real-time progress indicators and improved user experience throughout the platform.
current_status: Authentication is working correctly with existing interface. Streaming features fully implemented with Suspense for better UX, including streaming search results, table loading, enrichment progress, and enhanced feedback systems. All components built successfully and ready for production deployment.
